name: FwAnalyzer
description: A tool to analyze filesystem images for security. FwAnalyzer is a tool to analyze (ext2/3/4), FAT/VFat, SquashFS, UBIFS filesystem images, cpio archives, and directory content using a set of configurable rules. FwAnalyzer relies on e2tools for ext filesystems, mtools for FAT filesystems, squashfs-tools for SquashFS filesystems, and ubi_reader for UBIFS filesystems. cpio for cpio archives. SELinux/Capability support for ext2/3/4 images requires a patched version of e2tools. SELinux/Capability support for SquashFS images requires a patched version of squashfs-tools.
